thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1710
thread.title: Dominique

author: Dominique
title: Dominique
text: This is honnestly the best website for buying tickets online. The prices are cheap and still get you onto the flights you want. When trying to buy on other websites, the prices kept spiking up when paying, this never happened with flighthub. The price indicated didn't spike up when I showed interest in buying it. Also the tracking of prices on other dates is very usefull, helps get you on the cheapest flight!
